Reviews.Title: “Get what you pay for”

Reviews.Content: singapore extremely expensive city paid 55 night thailand quality hotel disgusted singapore expensive 55 considered budget hotel pay bed pretty mattress floor bathroom wet mold bathroom pretty gross location bad 2 minute walk subway hop town price looking sleep night decent price bad dont expect

Reviews.Content: stayed week feb basic furniture creaky bathroom stinky prepared stinky bathrooms budget hotels singapore ive definitely seen ones terrible plug loose contact resulting audible 3 lamps functional neither resolved stay despite complaints lift day resulting climb 4 levels stairs construction activity neighbourhood forewarned firealarm 0300 hrs unexpected worse twice nights false alarm couple front desk staff courteous beyond guess spent 20 dollars extra hotels neighbourhood

Reviews.Title: “a good alternative to Geylang hotels/inns”
Reviews.Author: twisted_bratinella
Reviews.Content: stayed night meeting husband singapore holiday coming countries flight arrived earlier 4pm 2am day didnt wait airport due sheer exhaustion cheap accommodation actually booked decent bit pricey hotel rest stay singapore meeting husband anyway didnt stay geylang cheap hotels mainly solo hours comfortable checking seedy albeit affordable hotel inn sg safe country alternatives research decided inn admittedly reviews bit wary id suck night rates getting hotel breeze zip code cab driver actually surprised chic exterior lobby hotel noticed situated residential temples beside hawker nearby specifically requested double top floors elevators read reviews walls thin wouldnt able sleep noise especially near lifts request granted thank god ok actually expected clean wellkept bed tv cable channels restroom expected clean opinion closet stuffs hangers coffee sachets kettle hot water 2 bottled water toiletries fresh towels provided pet peeve blanket dont unacceptable call reception times coz freezing thats receptionist bit customer service rude acted bother blanket duh brought blanket 30mins call grrr wasnt blanket thick anyway decided walk bit checkin buy sg sim card calls nearest mall city square mall 10minutes walk hotel walk fun bit found nearest mrt farrer park opposite mall honestly transportation ok youre looking decent accessible inn geylang imagine getting hotel luggage airport easy due walk warning husband hotel fine 2am checked morning fast easy receptionist hospitable lot nicer definitely recommend inn looking cheap alternatives geylang hotels am actually considering sg trip soon

Reviews.Content: reading reviews deal expecting hotel facilities expecting clean arrived hotel greeted staff barely spoke word twin double bed nonsmoking immediately nonsmoking stank cigarette smoke cigarette burns bedspread tiny tiny cupboard table belongings tv top corner ceiling tiny luggage spent time hotel stepping bathroom reasonable bit cleaner main disappointment bedroom lack cleanliness bedspreads towels provided believe nonsmoking exists hotel despite cigarette smell insisted smoking location pretty close mrt station hotel wireless internet pro choice pay little extra nicer hotel actually enjoy wasnt worth price cheap
